article:
Have Faith in life
Faith, is very important. Do   _  thing to have self-confidence, no confidence, just like a   _   lost in the sea. I have ever heard of a story told by  _  who have a lot of experiences. 
The is a story about a monastery in Europe perched high on    _  several  hundred feet in th air.The only way to reach   _    thewas to be suspended in a basket which was   _  to the top by several monks who pulled and tugged with all their  _   .
Obviously the ride up the steep cliff in that basket was   _  .
One tourist got exceedingly nervous about    half-way  up as he noticed that the rope by which hewas    _  was old and frayed.With   _  voice,he asked the monk who was riding with him in the basket how often they changed the   _  .  
The monk thought for a moment and answered   _  ," Whenever it breaks."
After hearing the story, I suddenly felt the   _   of confident. What is Confidence?   As  Li Bai said: "I am born to be useful". Let us go with full confidence, to   face up  to the challenges of life, to   _   harvestless fruits!
From now on,   make use of   every minute, every  _  , to enrich the   _  strength, to experience the meaning of life. Gas!
